title: I was banned because I was being harassed.
body:
Game 2
Sidicious: lol play
Sidicious: play
Sidicious: plaer
Sidicious: players r children
Sidicious: it is ur fault
Sidicious: u could have called ur lane
Sidicious: u could have supported
Sidicious: no he didnt
Sidicious: k reported
Sidicious: u did not have smite, u r a liar
Sidicious: garen had smite
Sidicious: ok so now ur changing ur story
Sidicious: so u called ur lane right
Sidicious: as a j4 jungle?
Sidicious: wrong
Sidicious: garen jungle looks like a troll pick
Sidicious: and u did not say jungle


Explain to me how this is a bannable offense??? I didnt curse or anything just asked a guy to go top lane. How the heck is that bannable... please tell me with logic or remove my ban.

I had 2000 games on this and you banned me for this 2 years ago and I'm still not unbanned... give me a break. Please unban me - this is ridiculous.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Sidicious,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=v3kKYq5M,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-22T01:59:32.659+0000)
>
> Game 2


/find Game 1
Error 404: Game 1 not found.
/end thread

While what was said in that chat log wasn't exactly 100% terrible, what you said wasn't exactly in the spirit of teamwork either. With that, it actually looks like there was another chat log combined with this one that ended up getting you escalated to a permaban. I don't want to give out too much of your personal info, but if you want the full context of what was said in the other game you're free to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I would like my account unbanned.

 It's been 2 years isn't that long enough??? Who can I speak to, to get this resolved? You already have players like videogamedunkey who are leaving this game for this exact reason.

Furthermore, its obvious to many players that this game's tribunal has been broken for quite sometime.

Explain to me the the logic of a toxic community, being the community that determines who is banned and who is not... This makes no sense. I've experienced countless AFKs and Disconnects yet do I complain? (No) All I want is a fair system which doesn't steal money from its user base for doing something that every other game on the planet allows (to be cursive). You're going to end up like Club Penguin if you continue in this trajectory and Riot is already beginning to have a falling out with this game as new and more accepting communities are developing. Please tell me how banning some of your most veteran players and not allowing them to criticize other players without getting banned is conducive to a "non-toxic" community. It's absurd I want it changed and so do many others.

You could have banned me for a year but no. Permanently??? And if you agree the 2nd game wasn't bad (at all) then why is it included in the ticket? As justification for calling someone a name. How often does that happen to me? All the time yet when I respond, which I always respond and never provoke, I'm the one who is banned. Ridiculous; If this were any other intellectual property you could be properly sued for this negligence.

Also the first game was a response to someone from Mexico calling me a stupid American. So I said he was a stupid Mexican but without proper context it makes me look terrible that's why I did not post it. It's one thing to have a person banned because they have psychologically toxic mindsets its another for a person to defend themselves from attackers. This is how the system of law works in many countries - why not here???

Fix it. Please.


Furthermore the ticket doesn't record nor does it show what was said pre-game. Context is important Riot any system of legality knows this. Even if you don't unban me - there should be a means to do so.

Also this was a ranked match. I know this as I only play ranked matches. AND I WAS DEFENDING A GAREN JUNGLER SO HE WOULDN'T RAGE yet i get banned for defending someone who was being harassed and defending myself IN A RANKED MATCH. I can't just leave nor can I mute because its ranked and I need to communicate.

Also, your system of /remake in combination with Leaverbuster is broken. I had to wait 60 minutes for 1 game because I had 2 afks slash remakes.

It just shows the lack of integrity with this company - as an aside.
